short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automates Cerbo actions regarding lab results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automates tasks in Cerbo, making it faster and easier to use. It extracts lab results and other data from the website, then uses generative AI to help the provider write feedback tailored to the patient.
